sentences.sContent: After the full moon and between the last quarter moon, the moon will be in its waning gibbous phase.
sentences.sContent_eng: After the full moon and between the last quarter moon, the moon will be in its waning gibbous phase.
sentences.sCn: 驼背； 圆形隆起物）”。 满月以后与满月与下弦月之间，月亮将处在其渐亏的阶段。

synos.tran: 突起的；[天]凸圆的；驼背的
